sections.heading: Ejectment. (1)RIGHT OF ACTION.—A person with a superior right to possession of real property may maintain an action of ejectment to recover possession of the property
sections.text: (2)JURISDICTION.—Circuit courts have exclusive jurisdiction in an action of ejectment.(3)NOTICE.—A plaintiff may not be required to provide any
